mapper.insert: insert into letsfutsal.user (email, password, nickname, gender, preferred_position, introduction) values (#{user.email}, #{user.password}, #{user.nickname}, #{user.gender}, #{user.preferredPosition}, #{user.introduction})
mapper.select: select t.* from letsfutsal.team t join letsfutsal.team_member tm on t.team_id = tm.team_id where tm.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: update letsfutsal.user set password = #{user.password}, nickname = #{user.nickname}, gender = #{user.gender}, preferred_position = #{user.preferredPosition}, introduction = #{user.introduction} where user_id = #{user.userId}
